mapper.insert: insert into tbl_approval (no,status,title, content, writer, receiver, curr_approval, next_approval) values (tbl_approval_seq.nextval, #{status},#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{receiver},#{curr_approval},#{next_approval})
mapper.select: select no, tbl_emp.ename writer_name, writer, tbl_dept.dname receiver_name, receiver,title,content, filename from tbl_approval, tbl_emp, tbl_dept where tbl_approval.writer=tbl_emp.empno and tbl_approval.receiver=tbl_dept.deptno and no=#{no}
select manager from tbl_emp where empno=#{empno}
select distinct tbl_dept.deptno, dname from tbl_dept, tbl_emp where tbl_emp.deptno=tbl_dept.deptno and tbl_dept.deptno!=#{deptno} and tbl_dept.deptno!=0 order by tbl_dept.deptno

select distinct empno, ename, tbl_emp.position from tbl_emp,tbl_position where tbl_emp.position=tbl_position.position and (tbl_emp.deptno=(select deptno from tbl_emp where empno=#{empno}) and tbl_position.posno < (select posno from tbl_emp, tbl_position where tbl_emp.position=tbl_position.position and tbl_emp.empno=#{empno}))
or tbl_emp.empno=1000
order by empno desc
